attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Miltonkeynes Council has avery bad attitude towards disabled people needing adaptions to there homes they say there is no money. But they give the contractor responsible for repairs a free hand in what they do and have done away with council inspectors wich means the contractor does a bodge it and leg it job sometimes they dont even do the job and still charge for it so no wonder they have no money bring back council inspectors to insure the money paid to the contractor is for work done and not just take there word.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
